name: 2D Space Characters
description:
Game Asset Category: 2D  Character Game Art Asset Pack 
Art Theme: Space Environment
Perspective: Top down isometric (Aliens can be use for 2D side scrolling too) 

All tiles and sprites are designed and exported base on a 1024x1024 pixels resolution screen size.

This an expansion pack that contains:
x5 Aliens ( each in 1024x1024 pixel, PNG, sprite)
x1 Spaceship (1024x1024 pixel, PNG, sprite)

Click here to purchase the Environment Asset Pack for this theme.

Note: All the items above are Static, in PNG format and can be used in a game engine of your choice. Assets are ready separated in layers for animation.
